text: Ani amhi isra'ilacya santatila samudrapara kele, maga tyancya pathopatha phira'auna apalya sain'yasaha juluma ani atireka karanyacya hetune nighala. Yetheparyanta ki jevha to budayala lagala tevha mhanala, mi imana rakhato ki jyavara isra'ilacya santatine imana rakhale ahe. Tyacyakherija konihi upasanesa patra nahi ani mi islama svikaranaryampaiki ahe
